dc_title_s: Geologic map of the Pennsylvanian area in north-central Texas
dc_description_s: Includes generalized columnar sections and generalized sectoin bend formation.; "Plate 1"--upper right.|132 x 75 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:194,000|General Map Collection
